mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SHOP( SHOP_ID, SHOP_NAME, AMAZON_ACCOUNT, MERCHANT_ID, ACCESSKEY_ID, SECRET_KEY, CREATE_USER, SHOP_STATE, COUNTRY_CODE, EMAIL ) VALUES ( seq_shop_id.nextval, #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amazonAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accesskeyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.name country_Name,t2.MARKETPLACEID,t2.ENDPOINT,t2.EXRATE from T_SHOP t1 left join T_COUNTRY t2 on t2.id = t1.country_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAX(SHOP_ID) AS shopId FROM T_SHOP GROUP BY COUNTRY_CODE) t3 ON t1.SHOP_ID=t3.shopId WHERE t3.shopId is not NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE T_SHOP set SHOP_NAME = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOP_STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMAZON_ACCOUNT = #{amazonAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY_CODE = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE SHOP_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t1.merchant_id,t1.accesskey_id,t1.secret_key,t2.ENDPOINT FROM T_SHOP t1 LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY t2 ON t2.id = t1.country_code WHERE t1.create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.shop_state = '1'
